villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ballistas.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 wood and +1 ore each day.

shipyard.name: Shipyard
shipyard.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

ship.name: Shipyard
ship.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

special1.name: Lighthouse
special1.description: The lighthouse grants additional mobility to any ships you control.

special2.name: Stables
special2.description: The Stables increase the land movement rate of any visiting hero.

special3.name: Brotherhood of the Sword
special3.description: During a siege, the Brotherhood of the Sword increases troop morale by +2.

horde1.name: Griffin Bastion
horde1.description: The Griffin Bastion increases Griffin production by 3 per week.

horde1Upgr.name: Griffin Bastion
horde1Upgr.description: The Griffin Bastion increases Royal Griffin production by 3 per week.

grail.name: Colossus
grail.description: The presence of the Colossus increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases the morale of all allied heroes by +2.

mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1
mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2
mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3
mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4
mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

dwellingLvl1.name: Guardhouse
dwellingLvl1.description: The Guardhouse allows you to recruit Pikemen.

dwellingLvl2.name: Archers' Tower
dwellingLvl2.description: The Archers' Tower allows you to recruit Archers.

dwellingLvl3.name: Griffin Tower
dwellingLvl3.description: The Griffin Tower allows you to recruit Griffins.

dwellingLvl4.name: Barracks
dwellingLvl4.description: The Barracks allow you to recruit Swordsmen.

dwellingLvl5.name: Monastery
dwellingLvl5.description: The Monastery allows you to recruit Monks.

dwellingLvl6.name: Training Grounds
dwellingLvl6.description: The Training Grounds allow you to recruit Cavaliers.

dwellingLvl7.name: Portal of Glory
dwellingLvl7.description: The Portal of Glory allows you to recruit Angels.

dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Guardhouse
dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Guardhouse allows you to recruit Halberdiers.

dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Archers' Tower
dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Archers' Tower allows you to recruit Marksmen.

dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Griffin Tower
dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Griffin Tower allows you to recruit Royal Griffins.

dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Barracks
dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Barracks allow you to recruit Crusaders.

dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Monastery
dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Monastery allows you to recruit Zealots.

dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Training Grounds
dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Training Grounds allow you to recruit Champions.

dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Portal of Glory
dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Portal of Glory allows you to recruit Arch Angels.
